Thunderstorm: I hope you understand that this strategy is a 
jeopardyzing one. We are, after all, a small group too. They can 
easily slaughter us if they have any kind of base defense. If you 
think we can get through this alive, then I'm with you.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Mustex: No but if they don't immediatly offer a treaty when we show 
up 
> we might as well count them as enemies and slag them while they're 
> small.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Thunderstorm: What? They declared war already? Who the slag are 
> they?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > Mustex: That's where you come in.  We blow them apart
> > > and salvage their base circuit by circuit.
> > >

> > > > don't see how 
> > > > useful it can be to have only cats in a group. They
> > > > won't have the 
> > > > forces needed to oppose airborne troops, let alone
> > > > fight a bomber...

> > > > > non-felines.

> > > > > >

> > > > > > > Mustex, Rhesus, and Mutate arrive at the base
> > > > (mutate manages to

> > > > > what

> > > > > > > Mustex:  You get that message about the cat

> > > > > > >
